format: JavaScript (using Redux Toolkit for state management)
description: This file defines a Redux slice named 'teams' which manages state related to team members, including actions for adding, removing, and updating members, as well as handling asynchronous fetch operations.

methods.name: addMember
methods.description: Reducer and prepare function to add a new member with autogenerated id and default role.

methods.name: removeMember
methods.description: Reducer to remove a member by id.

methods.name: updateMember
methods.description: Reducer to update a member's details by id.
